title: Cara Delevingne wears trouser suit at TAG Heuer photocall in China
text:
She recently launched her collaboration with online fashion retailer NastyGal, and was just unveiled as the face of Samsung's latest initiative SpaceSelfie.

And Cara Delevingne proved there's no rest for the wicked as she fulfilled her ambassador duties by attending a TAG Heuer photocall in Shanghai, China, on Sunday.

The supermodel, 27, displayed her flair for fashion as she was suited and booted in a white two-piece, which featured a longline blazer and matching wide-leg trousers.

She means business: Cara Delevingne proved there's no rest for the wicked as she fulfilled her ambassador duties by attending a TAG Heuer photocall in Shanghai, China, on Sunday

Upping the style ante, the media personality flashed a glimpse at a black lace bralet and put her best foot forward in a pair of plain cream stilettos.

The actress ensured focus remained on her smart outfit as she kept accessories to a minimum, but managed to inject a touch of sophistication to her appearance by sporting a brown watch from the luxury brand.

With her blonde shoulder-length tresses styled into loose waves, the Suicide Squad star opted for her signature smokey eye make-up look, teamed with nude lipgloss.

Androgynous chic: The supermodel, 27, displayed her flair for fashion as she was suited and booted in a white two-piece, which featured a longline blazer and matching wide-leg trousers

Keeping in theme: Upping the style ante, the media personality flashed a glimpse at a black lace bralet and put her best foot forward in a pair of plain cream stilettos

Earlier this month, the blonde beauty praised girlfriend Ashley Benson for making her feel like the 'luckiest girl in the world' as she attended the 2019 Girl Up #GirlHero Awards.

The Anna Karenina star said: 'It's so nice to have someone in my life that supports me so much and loves me. I'm the luckiest girl in the world.'

Cara also spoke to Porter, the digital edition of Net-A-Porter, about why her bond with her partner is different from her previous relationships.

All about the details: The actress injected a touch of sophistication to her appearance by sporting a brown watch from the luxury brand

'I’d never truly let anyone in before, for fear of them leaving. I never really trusted people, or felt worthy of it, and I always pushed them away,' she said.

The catwalk queen said of Pretty Little Liars star Ashley, 29: 'She’s the first person that has said: "You can’t push me away. I’m going to be nice to you, I love you."

'I’m just like, wait, so all I have to do is just let you be nice to me? Why have I never done that before? OK.'
description: The supermodel, 27, proved there's no rest for the wicked as she fulfilled her ambassador duties by attending a TAG Heuer photocall in Shanghai, China, on Sunday.
